title: AED Game Character Voice - The Infernal Lord
description: Call upon the ultimate evil himself in this expertly recorded voice pack! Filled to the Brimstone and oozing with evil, this pack is perfect for your next villain or bestial creature!
longDescription:
Audio Demo


AED Game Character Infernal Lord voiceover sound library provides you with more than 250+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, battle cries, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, character, and outstanding gameplay audio experiences. 

The Infernal Lords voice profile is deep, gritty and dripping with demonic energy with a pronounced vocal performance. He is perfect for demons, villains, giants, in-game non-player characters or any antagonist game characters with elements of evil or demonic tendencies. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects.

Features:

  • Vocal Profile: Deep, Rich, Male Voice
  • Perfect for NPC's like demons, evil wizards, creatures, werewolves, devils and film or movie based trailers.
  • Featuring 128 custom lines and 139 NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.
  • Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping, battle cries and demonic vocalizations and language to fully flesh out your newly created hell fiend!
  • Works with any DAW or Game Engine
  • Royalty Free and YouTube friendly
  • Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  296 male voice-over audio files
  • 67.2 MB of voice samples
  • All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format

Number of Audio Waves: 296

Number of Audio Cues: 296

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
